subsection.name: Installation Instructions

ol.li: Unzip maven-2.0-alpha-1-bin.zip to the directory you wish to install Maven 2.0. These instructions assume you chose C:\Program Files\Apache Software Foundation\maven-2.0-alpha-1

Add the bin directory to your path, by opening up the system properties (WinKey + Pause), selecting the "Advanced" tab, and the "Environment Variables" button, then editing the PATH variable in the user variables. eg. "C:\Program Files\Apache Software Foundation\maven-2.0-alpha-1";%PATH%
In the same dialog, make sure that JAVA_HOME is set to the location of your JDK, eg. C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_02
Run m2 --version to verify that it is correctly installed.

subsection.p: Unix-based Operating Systems (Linux, Solaris and Mac OS X)

ol.li: Extract the distribution archive to the directory you wish to install Maven 2.0. These instructions assume you chose /usr/local/maven-2.0-alpha-1. The directory maven-2.0-alpha-1 will be created from the archive.
Add the bin directory to your path, eg. export PATH=/usr/local/maven-2.0-alpha-1:$PATH
Make sure that JAVA_HOME is set to the location of your JDK, eg. export JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/jdk1.5.0_02
Run m2 --version to verify that it is correctly installed.
